vdb.name: twitter
vdb.description: Shows how to call Web Services

model.name: tweets
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW ( created_on string PRIMARY KEY, source varchar(50), text varchar(50) ) as SELECT tweet.* FROM (call twitter.invokeHTTP(endpoint=>'https://api.twitter.com/1.1/search/tweets.json?q=%40nihilist_arbys', action=>'GET')) w, XMLTABLE('/myxml/myxml' passing JSONTOXML('myxml', w.result) columns created_on string PATH 'created_at', source string PATH 'source', text string PATH 'text') tweet;
